prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Aqueduct Race Track Papers, 1958-1959, Accession # 10912, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This item was transferred to the library on February 21, 1990.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The new Aqueduct, "the wonder track of Thoroughbred racing," in New York, New York, opened on Monday, September 14, 1959. Included here are 16 items, 1958-1959, pertaining to Aqueduct: a bound volume of specifications and plans by Stone & Webster Engineering Corporation and a press folder of information on its opening, including press releases, background data, and a map of the track and its vicinity.
